attributes.action: Make All Drunk Driving Offences The Same
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I hearby propose that the prime minister should propose to the goverment that all drunk driving offences should be made the same.

This includes death by dangerous/drunk driving. Surley wether you kill somebody when driving when your drunk is a matter of luck. 

This change would mean if someone got a fine for driving drunk killing no one someone who kills someone (and for all we know could be driving safer) gets the same.

The British goverment need to make this more fair and have it in their power to, as killing someone is a matter of luck.

Thankyou
